translation-bundle.translation: Changing APIServlet state from to .
Bootstrapping XINS/Java Server Framework.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. State is unexpected.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Application server is behaving unexpectedly. Reason: .
Application server implements unexpected version of Java Servlet API Specification. Expected version: . Actual version: .

XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. System administration issue detected. The system property , which defines the location of the runtime properties file, cannot be read due to a security restriction. Caught an exception of type , message is .
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. System administration issue detected. The system property , which defines the location of the runtime properties file, is not set.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property , which defines the name of the API class, is not set.

XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property , which defines the name of the API class, is set to "", but that class cannot be loaded. Caught an exception of type , message is .
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property , which defines the name of the API class, is set to "", but that class does not derive from class .
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property is required for the API, but not set.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property is set to , which is considered an invalid value.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The API failed to bootstrap with the given build properties. Reason: .
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The API failed to bootstrap with the given build properties. Caught an exception of type , message is .
